text: Judgement.  Of the decisions that I made for my #Healing.  Stopping #chemotherapy halfway through (after a clear #MRI).  Choosing a #plantbased diet.  #fasting for 3 days around each infusion.  Got hammered for them all.  My #cancer, my choices (yes, I listened to all the advice) https://t.co/gfYc78zRdT
